::Prowl/Epyon/Hot Rod/Skyburst::

Skyburst and Hot Rod carry Nightstrike into a room, and strap him down
on the table, with metal cuffs. Force fields erupt from the exits. The
table's medical tools start sending the sedation virus into Nighstrike's
systems.

"He will be sedated soon," said Prowl. "You may begin within the next 10
minutes, Azure."

OOC: This will be my last post untill either Christmas night or
Wednesday. I'll c'ya later!
